title: Painting of the Nine Immortals - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xianxia
tags: Alchemy   Artifacts   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Cultivation   Eye Powers   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Immortals   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Pill Concocting   Romantic Subplot   Ruthless Protagonist   Spirit Advisor   Weak to Strong
author: Autumn Morning   秋晨
description:
Untolerated by heaven, a boy was restricted by the most powerful spell. 

He accidentally acquired a painting inhabited by nine souls that claimed to be immortal. 

Then, the legend of a strong young man who violated heavenly principles against the course of nature began.>
